page.title: 16GOLF COURSE,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: Llangollen golf course is situated off the{A.5.,}2 miles outside Llangollen. The secretary, is responsible for recruiting members and the running of the{golf club.}They have {563 members and can take a maximum of 600. Membership is{Â£77 on joining}and{Â£126 {annually.}Members can join from 12 onwards.The youngest is 12 and the oldest is 85.There are{18 greens}and{4 {practice greens.}Most members are from outside Llangollen area and most members come from{Wrexham.}The course covers{140 acres.}They have a Pro_Am competition every year.The secretary predicts that there will be increased membership by the year 2000 and a swimming pool,bowling green etc.Will be added attracting families.It will probably be the best golf course in Wales.
